name: Pretty Little Master Mynds
description:
NOTE: Click the fullscreen button when running in browser, or it will look wrong!

Here is my Coursera Capstone! It is great to finally finish the course.

This game is (C) 2021 by Roy Mullis

It uses licensed music from Joel Steudler.

The course rubric wants us to list 3 "changes" we made, but since this was written from scratch with no prefabs or code from any of our other courses, it's ALL changes! Instead of giving 100x "changes," I will give some notable things though:

  • All art and designs were done by me.
  • I wrote the codebase to flexible for expanding in the future.
  • I used an emitter to make the onclick effect.
  • Just a lot of good OOP/Unity practice throughout.

Thank you for playing and congrats on writing your own game; I look forward to playing yours as well!
